targets.expr: sum by (node_name, table_full_name, dbname, cluster) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_ins{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema="$schema_name", table_name="$table_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (node_name, table_full_name, dbname, cluster) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema="$schema_name", table_name="$table_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (node_name, table_full_name, dbname, cluster) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_hot_upd{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema="$schema_name", table_name="$table_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (node_name, table_full_name, dbname, cluster) (irate(pgwatch_table_stats_n_tup_del{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", schema="$schema_name", table_name="$table_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

irate(pgwatch_pg_statio_all_tables_heap_blks_hit{schemaname=~"$schema_name", datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", relname="$table_name"}[$__rate_interval]) * on() group_left() last_over_time(pgwatch_settings_numeric_value{datname="$db_name", cluster="$cluster_name", node_name="$node_name", setting_name="block_size"}[1d])
